joint_involvement.justification: EXPLICIT >10 joints (polyarticular involvement) based on the mention of polyarthrite rhumatoïde and PR in the patient facts.

serology.justification: No laboratory results provided, thus no RF or anti-CCP test scores can be assigned. No serological evidence found based on the given information.

acute_phase.justification: Laboratory results are not documented and there is no mention of elevated CRP or ESR in the patient facts provided.

duration.justification: Methotrexate (MTX) is mentioned as a first-line csDMARD. This suggests chronic/long-standing rheumatoid arthritis, giving this component a score of 1.

treatment_context.justification: Methotrexate (MTX) is mentioned as a first-line csDMARD and the patient facts indicate that they are on DMARDs, which provides strong evidence of established RA.

classification_rationale: The patient has scored 6/10 under ACR-EULAR criteria due to explicit polyarticular involvement (5 points for >10 joints) and the use of a DMARD (strong treatment context). This score, combined with the clinical picture supported by methotrexate therapy, leads to a classification as RA+. The lack of serological evidence is considered in balancing the strict interpretation of criteria.

retrieved_guidelines.title: Clinical Context
retrieved_guidelines.content:
Treatment patterns provide additional evidence:
- Methotrexate (MTX) = first-line csDMARD
- Biologic DMARDs (anti-TNF, anti-IL6, etc.) = established RA
- JAK inhibitors = treatment-refractory RA

In clinical practice:
- Score ≥6/10 = definite RA
- Score 4-5/10 + DMARD treatment = probable established RA
- Score ≥5/10 without treatment = borderline, likely RA

retrieved_guidelines.title: Category A: Joint Involvement (0-5 points)
retrieved_guidelines.content:
- 1 large joint: 0 points
- 2-10 large joints: 1 point
- 1-3 small joints (with or without large joints): 2 points
- 4-10 small joints (with or without large joints): 3 points
- >10 joints (at least 1 small joint): 5 points

Large joints: shoulders, elbows, hips, knees, ankles
Small joints: MCPs, PIPs, MTPs (2nd-5th), thumb IPs, wrists
